meanings.definition: The state of being sore or painful in the feet.
meanings.sent1: After the long hike, his footsoreness was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: She complained about her footsoreness after standing all day at work.
meanings.sent3: Despite the footsoreness, he couldn't resist dancing at the party.
meanings.sent4: The footsoreness felt like tiny needles poking his feet.
meanings.sent5: The footsoreness throbbed with each step he took.

meanings.definition: The condition of having sore feet.
meanings.sent1: Her footsoreness made it hard to walk to the store.
meanings.sent2: The footsoreness from wearing tight shoes was excruciating.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his footsoreness was from running a marathon in his dreams.
meanings.sent4: The footsoreness was a reminder of the long journey they had taken.
meanings.sent5: The footsoreness lingered even after soaking his feet in warm water.
